/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the landscape.
